actions.description: The giant makes two Greataxe or Rock attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) slashing damage, or 30 (3d12 + 11) slashing damage while raging.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: 11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

specialTraits.description: The giant has a 25 chance of having more than one head. If it has more than one, it has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.
specialTraits.name: Extra Heads

specialTraits.description: The giant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the giant takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The giant dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
specialTraits.name: Regeneration
